title: P-value Calculator (z, t, χ², F) with Interpretation

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: p = 2 × min(F(x), 1 − F(x)) for two-tailed tests p = 1 − F(x) for right-tailed tests p = F(x) for left-tailed tests
